#include <iostream>
long long int fact(long long int n)
{
	int i,sum=0;
	for(i=1;i<=n/2;i++)
	{
		if(n%i==0)
			sum+=i;
	}
	return sum;
}
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	long long int i,n,flag=1;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	for(i=n+1;i<=2*n;i++)
	{
		if(fact(i)==n&&fact(n)==i)
		{	printf("Yes, amicable with %lld\n",i);
			flag=0;
			break;
		}
	}
	if(flag==1)
		printf("No\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
